ValidationRule.description: Benefit Option does not match medical approval. Check to make sure option is correct or see Medical UW Team.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NEPs_Complete__c > DATE (2019,01,10), ISPICKVAL(Medical_Option__c,'PBS Non-Medical') || ISPICKVAL(Medical_Option__c,'Not Offering'), ISPICKVAL(Initial_Medical_UW_Approval__c,"Approved to Self-Retain")|| ISPICKVAL(Initial_Medical_UW_Approval__c,"Approved") || ISPICKVAL(Initial_Medical_UW_Approval__c,"Approved Dual Bands") || ISPICKVAL(Initial_Medical_UW_Approval__c,"Approved as an Add-On Exception") || ISPICKVAL(Initial_Medical_UW_Approval__c,"Approved as a Name/Fed ID/Ownership Change") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Benefit Option does not match Initial Medical approval. Check to make sure option is correct or see Medical UW Team.
